title: Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S9 FE is Still a Great Tablet, Especially with this Deal
description: Get it with as much as $100 OFF! The post Samsung’s Galaxy Tab S9 FE is Still a Great Tablet, Especially with this Deal appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get it with as much as $100 OFF!
text: If you’re in the market for a new midrange tablet, then you might want to check out Samsung’s Galaxy Tab FE series devices. They offer premium hardware and good performance at a considerably lower price than usual, especially compared to their flagship siblings. In particular, the Galaxy Tab S9 FE is on sale right on over at Amazon, for a much lower price than usual. In terms of hardware, the Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE comes in a sleek metal body, which encases a large 10.9-inch display that’s ideal for movie, web browsing, games, and more. It also comes with 128GB of internal storage, as well as a bundled stylus that makes it ideal for taking notes in class, or doodling sketches in your free time. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
